mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.parent_id as parentId, b.name as parentName, a.status from category a, category b where a.parent_id = b.id order by a.id
select a.id, a.name, a.parent_id as parentId, b.name as parentName, a.status from category a, category b where a.id = #{id} and a.parent_id = b.id
select a.id, a.name, a.parent_id as parentId, b.name as parentName, a.status from category a, category b where a.parent_id = b.id and status = #{status} order by a.id
select id, name from category where parent_id = 0 and status = 1 order by id
mapper.insert: insert into category(name, parent_id, status) values(#{name}, #{parentId}, #{status})
mapper.select: select id as value, name as label from category where parent_id = 0 and status = 1
select id as value, name as label from category where parent_id = #{parentId} and status = 1
select id, name from category where parent_id = #{parentId} and status = 1
select count(1) from category where status = 1
